title: IS_TURRET_SEAT
content:
0xE33FFA906CE748800x7C43D32A// IsTurretSeat
BOOL IS_TURRET_SEAT(Vehicle vehicle, int seatIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.seatIndex: See eSeatPosition declared in IS_VEHICLE_SEAT_FREE.
codeBlocks:
// IsTurretSeat
BOOL IS_TURRET_SEAT(Vehicle vehicle, int seatIndex);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for IS_TURRET_SEAT
IsTurretSeat(vehicle, 0)
